about_the_game:
On The Wire - Sur Le Fil (OTW for short) is an I.L.E.
It is a new concept proposed by AngeloStudio which means: Integrated learning environment.

Various disciplines are covered there such as: Electrical/Electronics, Mechanics, Computer Hardware and software including development.
To succeed in the various missions, Prof fil will offer you various courses in: Mathematics, Physical science and chemistry, Electronics, Computer science and development,
Mechanics, History of discoveries and History of life.
Prof will also make you do experiments that you can do in real life (Build batteries, speakers, your first multimeter, a telegraph...)
All in a playful and magical environment.
Language: French / English (to start)

short_description: Sur Le Fil or On the Wire (OTW for Friends) is a game focused on knowledge, in an interactive and fun way. The Wire Guy (Prof'Fil) will give you hundreds of missions, as funny as it is interesting, helped by Kelhann , one of the young Prof' students .
